team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet our experts
team.description: We are a team of professionals dedicated to drone services with passion and attention to detail. We specialize in videos, photography, aerial shots with drones, and other drone services. Each member of our team contributes their expertise to create exceptional results for our clients.

member1.name: J√°n Nov√°k
member1.description: With over 10 years of experience in drone flying, J√°n is our chief pilot. He specializes in technical flights, mapping, and security operations. He is a certified pilot with a license for commercial flights.

member2.name: M√°ria Kov√°ƒçov√°
member2.description: M√°ria is our creative soul who transforms raw footage into compelling stories. With extensive experience in production and post-production, she creates videos that capture the emotions and beauty of every project.

member3.name: Peter Horv√°th
member3.description: Peter is an expert in photography and post-production. With a perfect sense of detail and composition, he creates images that capture the unique perspective from the sky. His work has been awarded at several international competitions.

item2.label: Complexity and location
item2.value: Number of filming hours, terrain accessibility, required permits.

item3.label: Post-production
item3.value: Depends on whether you need just raw material or a complete output (editing, color corrections, music, subtitles).

quote.title: How to get a price quote?
quote.description: We'll be happy to contact you with a proposal that will match exactly your ideas.
quote.item1: Where and when you want to film
quote.item2: What purpose the material will serve

custom.label: Individual
custom.description: Every project is unique and requires an individual approach. Contact us and we'll prepare a price quote exactly according to your needs.

included.title: What services are included in the price?
included.description: The price list applies to the production of raw aerial footage and drone photographs, i.e., the time we spend directly on site.

postproduction.title: What about video or photo editing?
postproduction.description: By agreement with the client, each of our aerial photographs or video footage goes through professional post-production in our studio. How does the whole process work?

step1.title: Music Selection
step1.description: A well-chosen musical background in videos represents half the success. It creates the basic pillar and emotion from which subsequent post-production follows. Therefore, before the actual video post-production, we will send you 5 suitable music samples from the audio bank for selection.

step2.title: Editing
step2.description: Based on the selected music according to the concept, we will create a rough cut that we will send to you for approval. Then we will enrich the video with additional features and sound effects.

step3.title: Color Grading
step3.description: After approving the rough cut, we work on color grading. The image gets colors, shadows, temperature ‚Äì in short, the right juice. We create color grading on professional calibrated 4K monitors.

step4.title: 2D / 3D Animations
step4.description: According to requirements, we also create 2D animations ‚Äì original animated logo at the beginning of the video, tracked texts attached in the 3D space of the video or name tags displayed in the corner of the video. We also create 3D visualizations ‚Äì animations of environments and buildings.

step5.title: Final Render
step5.description: After approving the entire project, we export the video itself in the highest formats suitable for TV, online space and socials like Instagram, Facebook, Youtube. Finally, we upload it to the cloud, from where it will go to you.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional drone services for your needs

carousel.title: Our Services
carousel.subtitle: We offer a wide range of professional drone services for your needs

card1.title: Video Production and Video Creation
card1.description: Complete video production from script, through filming to post-production. We create custom advertising, presentation and promotional videos for companies, real estate agencies, hotels, events and social media.

card2.title: Photography
card2.description: We offer professional photography of real estate, events, products and other objects with emphasis on detail, composition and post-production. The resulting photographs are suitable for web, print and social media.

card3.title: Aerial Shots with Drone
card3.description: We capture your property, area, event or landscape from above in top quality. Aerial shots are ideal for presentations, marketing, monitoring and documentation.

card4.title: Have Footage and Need Post-Production?
card4.description: Post-production is what turns ordinary video into content that engages and stays in memory. Send us your materials and we'll bring them to life. We'll take care of precise editing, balanced colors, the right music and subtle effects that underline the atmosphere and story of your video.

equipment.title: What We Fly With
equipment.subtitle: We use professional drones and equipment for the best results

step1.title: Write to Us
step1.description: Send us an email at info@droneye.sk with your idea, the concept you're interested in, location and the expected date of flying.

step2.title: Consultation, Advice
step2.description: Together we will agree on a date, go through your idea and video goals in detail and then connect it with our creativity and experience.

step3.title: Permission
step3.description: We will then secure all necessary pre-flight permits and administration for you in accordance with the applicable rules of the given country.

step4.title: Flying
step4.description: On the agreed date we will arrive at the location and carry out filming according to the pre-agreed concept.

step5.title: Post-Production
step5.description: We will take care of professional photo editing and video editing to licensed music, and on request we will further adjust the content according to your ideas.

legislation.title: Legislation
legislation.subtitle: We do it only legally
legislation.intro: As one of the few companies in Slovakia, we conduct drone flights LEGALLY and have all the permits for UAS operations.

registration.title: UAV Registration
registration.description: Our drones (UAS) from the renowned brand DJI are officially approved by the European Aviation Safety Agency (EASA). Every drone we use is registered in the aircraft registry of the Transport Authority of the Slovak Republic and regularly undergoes our inspections and maintenance. This way, we guarantee that every flight complies with the latest legislative standards and aviation regulations.

license.title: Pilot License
license.description: We have successfully completed theoretical and practical exams for categories A1/A3, A2 and STS at the Transport Authority of the Slovak Republic in the civil aviation division. We are holders of an operating permit in the 'SPECIFIC' category for flying drones capable of flying without a pilot, in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2019/947.
license.item1: When flying, we do not endanger the safety of other aircraft, persons or property on the ground.
license.item2: During each flight, in accordance with applicable legislation, we maintain constant visual contact with the drone.
license.item3: For flying in CTR zone, we request permission from the airport tower.
license.item4: We can secure special permission for takeoff in close proximity to airports and military areas.

authorization.title: Authorization
authorization.description: The operating permit for the 'specific' category, issued and approved by the Transport Authority based on a strict assessment of the SORA risk analysis, authorizes us to legally conduct drone flights under specific conditions.

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.description: Each of our drones is properly insured against liability for damage caused by crashes, through concluded PZP insurance (liability insurance). The insurance amount is set at up to 1,300,000 EUR, which covers potential risks and ensures financial protection in case of unforeseen events during operation.

management.title: Permit Management
management.description: Our drone permits and operational documentation are managed by a verified and experienced company with which we work closely. This company ensures comprehensive management of our permits in the SPECIFIC category, including their regular updates and monitoring of current regulations, so that we can ensure the highest level of safety during our flights. With their help, we constantly adapt our operational documentation, thereby guaranteeing compliance with current aviation standards and regulations.

cookies.title: We use cookies
cookies.description: This website uses cookies to improve your experience. By continuing to browse, you agree to our use of cookies in accordance with our cookie policy.
cookies.settingsDescription: Select which cookies you want to allow. Necessary cookies are always active as they are required for basic website functionality.
cookies.necessaryDesc: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be disabled.
cookies.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors use our website.
cookies.marketingDesc: Used to personalize ads and measure their effectiveness.
cookies.youtubePlaceholder: To view this video, we need your consent for analytics cookies.

gdpr.title: GDPR
gdpr.subtitle: Privacy Policy Memorandum
gdpr.intro: Protecting the privacy of our customers when processing personal data is very important to us. When processing your personal data, we act in accordance with applicable legal regulations and ensure their protection to the maximum extent possible. All visitors to our website who are in contact with us as customers have provided us with their personal data in this regard. On this website you will find all the necessary information regarding the processing of personal data.
gdpr.intro2: This Privacy Policy Memorandum (hereinafter referred to as "Memorandum") will provide you with information on how we handle your personal data, how you can contact us in case of exercising your rights or if you have questions regarding the processing of your personal data. The Memorandum is part of the General Terms and Conditions of DroneEye.
gdpr.intro3: We recommend that you carefully read the information contained in this Memorandum. Changes regarding the conditions of personal data protection are published on our website www.droneye.sk in the form of an update. This way we ensure that you always have current information about the conditions under which we process your personal data.

section1.title: 1. About us
section1.description1: Through our website www.droneye.sk, we allow you as our customers to order aerial work. In connection with ordering our services, we are obliged to process your personal data.
section1.description2: When processing your personal data, we are guided by the legal regulations of the Slovak Republic, Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data (General Data Protection Regulation or GDPR), Act No. 18/2018 Coll. on the protection of personal data and other legal regulations.
section1.description3: The operator of information systems in which your personal data is processed is DroneEye, with its registered office in Bratislava, Slovakia.

section2.title: 2. What data do we process about you?
section2.description1: Personal data is considered to be data on the basis of which a specific natural person can be identified. This means that it is not just about known identifiers such as name, surname, or date of birth. GDPR defines personal data as any information that leads to the determination of a natural person. Every natural person whose personal data is concerned is considered a data subject with the relevant rights to personal data.
section2.description2: At DroneEye, we process only such personal data in order to provide you with professional services, and the scope of this personal data is determined by generally binding legal regulations. In the case where we process your personal data on the basis of consent, the list or scope of data is precisely stated directly in the consent, to the extent necessary to fulfill the purpose for which the personal data is processed.
section2.description3: The processed data includes primarily the following categories of personal data:
section2.item1: Billing data: name, surname, billing address, email address, phone contact, delivery address.
section2.item2: Registration data: data obtained when submitting the contact form www.droneye.sk/contact
section2.item3: Marketing data: name and surname, date of birth, address, IP address, email address, phone number.

section3.title: 3. Why do we need your personal data?
section3.description: We process your data to the necessary extent, and most processing is justified by the fact that we need this data to provide the purchased product.
section3.subtitle1: 3.1. We fulfill our obligations arising from relevant legal regulations
section3.item1: We are obliged to identify you when ordering services and issuing an order in your name
section3.item2: In our activities, we are obliged to act prudently and respect your rights as a consumer in accordance with Act No. 102/2014 Coll. on consumer protection in the sale of goods or provision of services at a distance
section3.item3: We are obliged to issue an invoice and record it in accordance with the VAT Act

section4.title: 4. Retention period of personal data
section4.description1: We retain your personal data only for the period necessary to fulfill the purpose for which the personal data were processed, or for the period required by legal regulations.
section4.description2: If we process your personal data on the basis of consent, we retain them until the consent is withdrawn, or until the period necessary to fulfill the purpose of processing personal data.
section4.description3: After the retention period expires, your personal data will be deleted or anonymized in accordance with applicable legal regulations.

section5.title: 5. Your rights
section5.description: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
section5.item1: Right of access to personal data - you have the right to obtain information about what personal data we process about you
section5.item2: Right to rectification - you have the right to request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal data
section5.item3: Right to erasure - you have the right to request deletion of your personal data under certain conditions
section5.item4: Right to restriction of processing - you have the right to request restriction of processing of your personal data
section5.item5: Right to data portability - you have the right to obtain your personal data in a structured format
section5.item6: Right to object - you have the right to object to the processing of your personal data
section5.item7: Right to withdraw consent - if we process your personal data on the basis of consent, you have the right to withdraw this consent at any time

section6.title: 6. How you can exercise your rights
section6.description1: If you wish to exercise any of your rights listed above, you can contact us via email at info@droneye.sk or in writing to our address.
section6.description2: We will process your request without undue delay, no later than 30 days from its delivery. In case of complex requests or a large number of requests, we reserve the right to extend this period by another 60 days, of which we will inform you.

section7.title: 7. Security of personal data
section7.description1: When processing your personal data, we use appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the protection of your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, destruction or alteration.
section7.description2: Our systems are regularly updated and monitored to ensure maximum security of your personal data.

section8.title: 8. Transfer of personal data to third countries
section8.description: We process your personal data exclusively within the European Union. In case it would be necessary to transfer your personal data to third countries, we will ensure that such transfers are in accordance with applicable legal regulations and that appropriate guarantees for the protection of your personal data are secured.

section9.title: 9. Automated decision-making and profiling
section9.description: We do not use your personal data for automated decision-making or profiling within the meaning of GDPR. All decisions regarding the processing of your personal data are made by human employees.

section10.title: 10. Processing of your personal data through our website
section10.description: When using our website: www.droneye.sk (hereinafter referred to as "Website"), access to some parts of the Website may be conditional on providing your personal data. This provision conditions access or proper functioning of the Website and for this reason it is necessary for you to grant us consent to process the personal data you have provided.

section11.title: 11. Processing data through cookies
section11.description1: We are authorized to collect and otherwise process data about visitors and users of our Website through tools used for automated data collection, especially cookie files, logs and other commonly used tools for obtaining information through the website.
section11.description2: A cookie can be thought of as a small amount of data that is sent as a file to your computer (tablet, smartphone) from the website you are currently visiting. The data file is stored in the computer and on each subsequent visit to the same website, the computer sends information to our server.
section11.description3: Most websites, including ours, use cookies. The purpose of cookies is to facilitate and improve your use of our Website. A cookie file allows the website to recognize whether you have visited it in the past and which section you were interested in. At the same time, it is cookies that allow you to save your user settings such as language recognition or remembering your login name. Using cookies, we store data that we do not associate with your person and through the obtained data we do not realize customer identification.
section11.description4: Using cookie files is not dangerous for you, cookies cannot transmit viruses or read data from the device's hard drive.
section11.description5: By visiting our website, you automatically express your consent to the use of this technology. This procedure follows from ¬ß 55 para. 5 of Act No. 355/2011 Coll. on electronic communications, according to which the use of the appropriate setting of a web browser or other computer program is also considered consent for this purpose.
section11.description6: The use of cookies and their permission in a web browser is at the free will of each website user. You can freely delete cookie files or set your internet browser in advance to either reject cookie files or warn you when the server tries to send you a cookie. However, it may then happen that websites that depend on cookie support will not work as you would expect, or that parts of the pages will not be available to you.
section11.description7: We use persistent cookie files that help us identify your device when you revisit the Website and thus allow us to provide services in accordance with your expectations. We store Cookie files for 1 year.

section12.title: 12. Circle of recipients
section12.description1: We do not unnecessarily make your personal data available to any entities. However, it is necessary that some personal data be made available to a predetermined circle of recipients of personal data. In the case of sending goods (e.g. printed drone photograph) to you as the end customer, we provide your personal data to postal carriers or courier companies. In the case of management and maintenance of our website, your personal data is made available to the website administrator. Last but not least, these are persons such as an accountant and tax advisor.
section12.item1: Postal carriers within the meaning of Act 324/2011 Coll. on postal services

section13.title: 13. Final provisions
section13.description: The operator is DroneEye, with its registered office in Bratislava, Slovakia. The company operates the website www.droneye.sk. In case of questions regarding personal data protection that you did not find an answer to in this document, please write to info@droneye.sk.
